segments.text: My eyes are drawn to the other side of the kitchen now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: There's a boy, probably quite young, climbing on a stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's reaching into an open cabinet where I can clearly see a "COOKIE JAR."
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: One hand is inside, and the other holds a plate, ready to collect his loot.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks incredibly unstable, its legs splayed out.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can almost see it tipping backward, it's so precarious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His little sister is standing nearby, arm outstretched, eagerly awaiting her share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They are quite focused on their secret mission, aren't they?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I just hope that stool holds up for a few more seconds.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It would be a nasty fall onto that hard kitchen floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I admire their daring spirit, though, going for the cookies like that.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're working together, which is kind of sweet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But the potential for a fall is so clear to me.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a classic childhood caper, but with an added element of danger.
segments.speaker: PAR
